alert.note: Alert for Banks; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 1:43AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Banks and Jackson Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 143 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Lula to near Gillsville to near Pendergrass, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Commerce, Homer, Braselton, Lula, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Pendergrass, Gillsville, Talmo, Peach State Speedway, Pinefield Crossroads, Apple Valley and Banks Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
